NextGen Cooperative
BylawsMembership

Who?

We are a worker owned business providing professional software development solutions.

What?

  • Web Development and Design
  • App Development and Design
  • Data Analytics
  • Social Media
  • SEO Optimization
  • Long Term Maintenance

These are the services we offer, and we strive to offer more to our community.

A cooperative business model functions similarly to traditional business models. The primary difference is that instead of being privately owned by a single entity or group, or publicly owned via stock shares purchasable on the market, we are entirely owned by the people who work here. Each member gets a vote on issues that affect the business, and the consensus wins. For more details, see our bylaws

Where?

We are incorporated in northwest Tennessee, with members from all over the US providing services all over the world.

Why?

There are tons of agencies out there that can handle most tasks. But most of them treat their employees as a means to larger profit margins. At NextGen the employees are the owners, which means you not only get highly skilled people, but also highly motivated as our company does not have executive leadership to pay a premium for. Our people are paid well, and we can still deliver higher quality with a smaller budget.

How?

If you wish to get involved with what we do, simply read our bylaws and then head to the membership page for more details.

If you're looking for web or app development, please contact us directly via your preferred means.

Check out our Discord

We are a 100% worker owned cooperative of professional software developers offering web and app development services. We also provide training for those who might be interested in any aspect of computer software.
